content: {'id': '9fd86119-712b-33fe-932c-63729ca9cde3', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': 'India regulator still reviewing more than a dozen allegations against Adani, sources say', 'description': '', 'summary': "India's market regulator is still looking into more than a dozen allegations that Adani Group and its offshore funds broke securities regulations, two sources with direct knowledge of the investigations said on Friday.  They spoke a day after the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) dismissed two allegations - one of stock manipulation, the other non-disclosure of related party transactions - made two years ago against Adani by U.S. short-seller Hindenburg Research.  The conglomerate owned by billionaire Gautam Adani - which includes infrastructure giants Adani Ports (APSE.NS) and Adani Power (ADAN.NS) as well as his flagship Adani Enterprises - has regularly dismissed all the allegations by Hindenburg as baseless.", 'pubDate': '2025-09-19T20:08:42Z', 'displayTime': '2025-09-19T20:08:42Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/f5b644d49dbd6dd5d0b1cb7b4eefa6bf', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 536, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: The logo of the Adani Group is seen on the facade of its Corporate House on the outskirts of Ahmedabad, India, November 22, 2024. content: {'id': '99ae5fa4-0abc-3095-8139-95593b5f690d', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "Adani Group stocks rise as SEBI's dismissal signals end to Hindenburg overhang", 'description': '', 'summary': 'Adani Group stocks closed higher on Friday, a day after India\'s markets regulator dismissed parts of short-seller Hindenburg Research\'s stock manipulation allegations against billionaire Gautam Adani and his conglomerate, signalling a potential end to the group\'s regulatory troubles.  The Securities and Exchange Board of India is still examining more than a dozen allegations that Adani Group and certain offshore funds broke securities rules, Reuters reported, citing sources.  "There are at least over a dozen cases still pending for final orders," the source said, referring to decisions on whether to dismiss allegations or impose monetary penalties.', 'pubDate': '2025-09-19T11:56:14Z', 'displayTime': '2025-09-19T11:56:14Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/29f30988400ee7eee626aa6d30464843', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 545, 'caption': 'A logo of the Adani Group is seen on a commercial complex in Mumbai, India, February 7, 2023. content: {'id': 'a1c3e4db-b270-3dfe-94fe-48347741a43c', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's SEBI dismisses Hindenburg allegations against Adani group", 'description': '', 'summary': 'The Securities and Exchange Board of India on Thursday dismissed allegations of stock manipulation against billionaire Gautam Adani and his group of companies made by U.S. short-seller Hindenburg Research. content: {'id': 'c57c21a6-7868-3365-a3c9-bfb7c2c97716', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "Adani's new copper smelter in India applies to become LME-listed brand", 'description': '', 'summary': "LONDON (Reuters) -A major new copper smelter in India owned by Adani Enterprises Ltd has applied to become a listed copper-producing brand with the London Metal Exchange, the LME said in a notice on Wednesday.  The copper smelter, which has an annual production capacity of 500,000 metric tons, is coming online at a time of shrinking smelting margins due to new smelter capacity in China and slower-than-expected growth of copper concentrate supply.  According to Adani, the $1.2 billion Kutch Copper facility in the western state of Gujarat is the world's biggest single-location plant of its type.", 'pubDate': '2025-08-13T16:36:16Z', 'displayTime': '2025-08-13T16:36:16Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/77c3af97b66d41a9dd279728fc920990', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 533, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: The logo of the Adani Group is seen on the facade of its Corporate House on the outskirts of Ahmedabad', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/.f6Wb6mMcrgTyLnouHcodQ--~B/aD01MzM7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/77c3af97b66d41a9dd279728fc920990', 'width': 800, 'height': 533, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/zvXDzJMhZSfoyc.v89r0bA--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/77c3af97b66d41a9dd279728fc920990', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/adanis-copper-smelter-india-applies-163616486.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adanis-copper-smelter-india-applies-163616486.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '99f6fb61-ae11-37b9-b73c-c3a67c5f9f74', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Adani Enterprises' public debt issue oversubscribed on launch day, bankers say", 'description': '', 'summary': "MUMBAI (Reuters) -Indian billionaire Gautam Adani's flagship firm saw strong demand for its second public bond issue in less than a year, with the offering oversubscribed on launch day, three merchant bankers said on Wednesday.  Adani Enterprises plans to raise up to 10 billion rupees ($116.7 million) through the sale of two-, three- and five-year bonds.  It will now close on Friday, ahead of its earlier schedule of July 22, Adani Enterprises said in a public notice.", 'pubDate': '2025-07-09T12:01:52Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-09T12:01:52Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/b97af0d88ff9b54069921c3315cc18e4', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 533, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: The logo of the Adani Group is seen on the facade of its Corporate House on the outskirts of Ahmedabad', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/qSXjRDhhmZRYJQwUCdVkYg--~B/aD01MzM7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/b97af0d88ff9b54069921c3315cc18e4', 'width': 800, 'height': 533, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/_cVtkZCsfIeSvVgU1O3S0g--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/b97af0d88ff9b54069921c3315cc18e4', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-adani-enterprises-public-debt-120152321.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-adani-enterprises-public-debt-120152321.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': 'df44a6c1-2656-397e-bae9-966f6fb0c4c3', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Adani Enterprises to sell 2-5 year debt at public bond sale next week, sources say", 'description': '', 'summary': "MUMBAI (Reuters) -Indian billionaire Gautam Adani's flagship firm plans to raise up to 10 billion rupees ($116.77 million) through a retail bond issue opening for public subscription next week, two sources aware of the development told Reuters on Tuesday.  Adani Enterprises will sell two-year, three-year and five-year bonds through the issue, which will remain open for subscription from July 9 to July 22, the sources added.  The company will pay an annual coupon of 8.95% on its two-year bonds, 9.15% on three-year bonds and 9.30% on five-year bonds, and will also have an option to defer interest payment to maturity, the sources said.", 'pubDate': '2025-07-01T08:07:54Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-01T08:07:54Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/f8c9fa6ae2256f61944ea312e458f870', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 533, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: FILE PHOTO: The logo of the Adani Group is seen on the facade of its Corporate House on the outskirts of Ahmedabad', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/81dtAVnzhmvUZ_8Wr6ARcg--~B/aD01MzM7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/f8c9fa6ae2256f61944ea312e458f870', 'width': 800, 'height': 533, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/l6zvai4d.KJJ4cbR_6Vo3g--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/f8c9fa6ae2256f61944ea312e458f870', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-adani-enterprises-sell-2-080754242.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-adani-enterprises-sell-2-080754242.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}
